intro: Step 1: Enter some term to search for. e.g. rheumatoid arthritis.
title: Search box

intro: Step 2: Click to select 1 row in the search results.
title: Input table

intro: Step 3: Screening selected row for NLP/Codififed nodes.
title: Candidate nodes

intro:
Step 4: Submit your selection to the server and show.
Unselect: Press this button to clear your selection.
title: Buttons

intro: Optional Step: Filter nodes by cosine similarity or category.
title: Filter

intro: Click the tabs at the top of the main page to view the plots of the hierarchy, network and circular plots of the connected nodes for your selction. You can also view the details in table format by going to the table tab.
title: Main page

intro: Download the data of the candidate nodes.
title: Download

intro: Bookmark this application's state and get a URL for sharing.
title: Bookmark
